author: arobinson74
msg: Added try catch around the form submit with a display of a translatable message for failure to sumbit the form with an inputFile. The code isn't 100% foolproof as I do not see a way to make sure that it was indeed the inputFile that caused the error, but it should work for the large portion of the use cases
